column4: my old system running xp pro amd socket A 2.2ghz 1gb ram , ti4200 video card, cant play 720p video it just stutters..  would ubuntu help me?
yea im just thinking without buying more ram..or a new comuter
ok another question, i am getting a live cd version of ubuntu, will that give me a real world example of how it would run installed?
roughly yes, though a slower one
